articles.description: The manner of Manchester City’s demolition of Brighton sounds an ominous note for anyone wishing to wrestle away their crown, writes Phil McNulty.
articles.title: Manchester City: 'With Premier League title in sight, City rarely show any weakness'

articles.description: The Chicago Bears make quarterback Caleb Williams the first pick pf the 2024 NFL Draft.
articles.title: NFL Draft results: Caleb Williams picked first by Chicago Bears

articles.description: Arne Slot confirms that he is interested in becoming Liverpool's manager after Jurgen Klopp leaves at the end of the season.
articles.title: Liverpool: Feyenoord boss Arne Slot confirms he wants Anfield job

articles.description: Red Bull design chief Adrian Newey is to leave the team in the wake of the controversy involving allegations about team principal Christian Horner.
articles.title: Adrian Newey: Red Bull design chief to leave team

articles.description: Rafael Nadal begins his Madrid Open farewell with a comfortable straight-set win over American teenager Darwin Blanch.
articles.title: Madrid Open: Rafael Nadal begins farewell with straight-set win

articles.description: Manchester United fan Luke Littler is booed by the crowd in Liverpool but beats Rob Cross to win Premier League Darts night 13.
articles.title: Luke Littler booed but wins Premier League Darts in Liverpool

articles.description: England make two injury-enforced changes to face France in their Grand Slam decider on Saturday in Bordeaux.
articles.title: Women's Six Nations 2024: England hooker Amy Cokayne returns
Man City thrash Brighton to go second in table

articles.description: Chelsea midfielder Enzo Fernandez will miss the rest of the season after undergoing successful surgery on a groin issue.
articles.title: Enzo Fernandez: Chelsea midfielder to miss rest of season after operation

articles.description: Chelsea captain Millie Bright tells BBC Sport it is the "biggest game of our careers" as the Blues prepare to take on Barcelona in the Women's Champions League semi-finals on Saturday.
articles.title: Chelsea's Bright on 'biggest game of career' against Barca
